name: Necroverse BETA
description:
Your birthday is coming soon, though you may not get the gift you requested. Quickly running out of reasons, you decide to run away from it all, unaware that a new unfamiliar world exists after death; The Necroverse.

[This is a BETA release! Please acknowledge that this game is currently incomplete, and may be subject to change.  The mac version of the build also has not been tested, so we apologize for any bugs or errors. Any criticisms or suggestions can be emailed to the developer here. Thank you!]
